name: quick-notes
description: Quick scratchpad: remember things, search notes, list by date

tools.name: quick_note_add
tools.description: Add a quick note (remember something). Stored in ~/.jarvis/notes with optional tag and date.

tools.name: quick_note_search
tools.description: Search quick notes by keyword or tag. Returns matching notes with date.

query.description: Search text or tag to find in notes

tools.name: quick_note_list
tools.description: List quick notes, optionally filtered by tag or date (e.g. this week).

days.description: Only notes from the last N days (e.g. 7 for this week)
